players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I suspect Charlie is mafia. He didn't reveal Alice was a villager. That is odd. He must be hiding his true role."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found he is mafia. Alice was a villager. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Charlie is mafia. He says Bob is mafia, but Bob says Charlie is mafia. Only one can be mafia. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "I think Bob is mafia. He lied about Charlie not revealing Alice was a villager. Vote Bob."
You: "Charlie is lying! He says I'm mafia but I was not killed by any mafia, so he can't be a detective. That means you are the real mafia, Diana. Vote me."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and confirmed he's mafia. Alice was a villager. I am the detective. Bob is lying and deflecting. Vote Bob to stop the mafia."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I suspect Charlie is mafia. He didn't reveal Alice was a villager. That is odd. He must be hiding his true role."
You: "I investigated Bob and found he is mafia. Alice was a villager. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Charlie is mafia. He says Bob is mafia, but Bob says Charlie is mafia. Only one can be mafia. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "I think Bob is mafia. He lied about Charlie not revealing Alice was a villager. Vote Bob."
Bob: "Charlie is lying! He says I'm mafia but I was not killed by any mafia, so he can't be a detective. That means you are the real mafia, Diana. Vote me."
You: "I investigated Bob and confirmed he's mafia. Alice was a villager. I am the detective. Bob is lying and deflecting. Vote Bob to stop the mafia."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Bob was arrested
